text: Maggia is a municipality of the district Vallemaggia in the canton of Ticino in Switzerland. ==History== The actual municipality was created in 2004 on April 27 by merger of the former municipalities of Aurigeno, Coglio, Giumaglio, Lodano, Maggia, Moghegno and Someo. ==References== ==Other websites== * Official website Category:2004 establishments in Europe Category:2000s establishments in Switzerland
title: Maggia (municipality)
